name: Meta Age Verification
author: adastracrypto.com

sections.description:
A better way to restrict crypto users by their age with blockchain and browser wallets.

How it works

Once activated, the plugin will show an age verification popup asking users to verify their age before proceeding to view any webpage.

Getting Started

Minimum Requirements

  • WordPress 5.6 or greater
  • PHP version 7.2 or greater (PHP 7.4 or greater is recommended)
  • MySQL version 5.5 or greater (MySQL 5.7 or greater is recommended)

Automatic installation

To do an automatic install of this plugin, log in to your WordPress admin dashboard, navigate to the Plugins menu and click Add New.

In the search field, type “meta age verification” and click Search Plugins. Once you’ve found this plugin, you can install it by simply clicking “Install Now”.

Manual installation

WordPress codex contains instructions on how to do this here.
sections.faq:
How to activate the plugin?

On activation, you will be asked for email verification and Terms of Service (ToS) agreement. Just enter your email address and check the ToS checkbox. Then click on the “Activate” button, follow the activation link sent to your email to activate the plugin.

How can i get support?

Feel free to create a ticket at plugin’s support section.

How can i contribute?

Please check out development section!
